LanguageData.Apparel_PlateArmor.description: Overlapping solid plates of armor covering the entire body from neck to feet.\n\nArmor like this are a very common sight with knights and warriors and many questing adventurers in medieval worlds, able to stop sword slashes or club strikes or low-caliber cartridges, but has limited protected against advanced firearms which can penetrate it's armor. The armor itself is also surprisingly uncommon in the rims as well.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.label: power armor
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.description: A suit of light powered armor. Layered plasteel-weave plates are very effective at stopping attacks, with few vulnerable joint sections. Neuro-memetic assistors allow a person to wear this armor and still move quite easily.\n\nThese types of armor like are commonly seen with advanced civilizations military forces and space marines navies and are a standard issue in many glitterworld national guards and police forces.
